news_header: Last year was challenging for Outokumpu, with an adjusted EBITDA loss of EUR 3 million in Q4, down from a EUR 72 million profit the previous year. Stainless steel supply decreased by 6% to 422,000 tonnes.
news_text: The company has decided to abandon its project to expand cold rolling in the U.S. due to weak markets, according to Managing Director Kati ter Horst.
